attributes.action: Ban bedroom tax on council houses
attributes.additional_details: The council charge per spare bedroom for anyone in receipt of benefits. These are our homes, why should we be penalized for not working, when I'm a carer, already saving the government money. people in work don't have to pay it, as a carer I'm already struggling.
attributes.background: Stop the council charging for extra bedrooms for benefit claimants

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Abolish the Bedroom Tax
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655696
